title: WEN by Chaz Dean Fig Cleansing Conditioner 16 oz
description: WEN BY CHAZ DEAN by Chaz Dean WEN CLEANSING CONDITIONER FIG 16 OZ

title: WEN® Fig Cleansing Conditioner 32oz
description: Fig Cleansing Conditioner is a universal cleanser that is wonderful for medium to coarse, wavy to curly, and ethnic hair. Due to its rich, dense consistency, it works exceptionally well in moisturizing, hydrating and replenishing dry, heat-damaged, color-treated or dehydrated hair. This Cleansing Conditioner is a sodium laurel sulfate and detergent-free formula that cleanses without lathering or stripping the scalp or hair of its natural moisture.

title: WEN by Chaz Dean 32oz Cleansing Conditioner (Tea Tree)
description: Pomegranate: universal for all hair types; soy-based  ---  Tea tree is exceptional for dry, flaky, or sensitive scalps. For all hair types, it has moisturizing properties for medium-to-coarse, wavy-to-curly, and ethnic hair
